author: tomaz
msg: Add a standard API and methods for managing storage volumes to the
Base API consistent of the following methods: create_volume,
Also change ex_describe_tags, ex_create_tags and ex_delete_tags methods
signature in the EC2 driver. Argument is now called resource (previously
it was called node). This methods work with both Node and StorageVolume
Contributed by Gabriel Reid, part of LIBCLOUD-213.

author: dsmiley
msg: SOLR-3534 Removed a small bit of redundant testing that tests if [e]dismax defaults to schema defaultSearchField (already tested by TestExtendedDismaxParser).  These specific tests will fail for another reason soon if left as is.

author: rickhall
msg: Remove some unnecessary casts after introducing R5 API. (FELIX-3504)

author: djencks
msg: FELIX-3559 Change immediate component manager to register service, then create implementation per spec
